"In the Driving Rain 2017":
"In the forest area of Naberius,
there's a strange phenomenon that
the wind and rain do not stop. Also
reports of unfamiliar enemies appearing.
Their relationship with the weather is
unknown. All ARKS, prepare to investigate
the abnormal weather and the cause.
――――――――――――――――――――
Sharing of Quest Points / Yes
Failure Conditions / Time limit expires"

"Transfer will begin soon.
A local storm in the area
has been confirmed."

"It's unknown if it's related,
but Phantoms have been confirmed
to be in the teleport destination."

"The situation is indeed
dangerous beyond imagination.
Don't force yourselves and
proceed with caution. Good luck!"
